nodes.text: Bongo Heavy Missiles were aquatic anti-starfighter vessels of the Gungan fleet, and were upgraded versions of Bongo Missiles. They were based on tribubble bongos, but were armed with two surface-to-air missile launchers to defend against enemy aircraft. They were, however, defenseless against other ships or ground forces. The ship's main body was crescent-shaped and had two separate cockpits, and were driven by two propellers on outriggers. Bongo Missiles were constructed at shipyards for a cost of 100 units of carbon and 35 units of nova crystals. Bongo Heavy Missiles saw action against the Trade Federation in 32 BBY during the occupation of Naboo.
Bongo Heavy Missiles appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack. They are the Gungan heavy anti-air naval units.
